notes_text: Medical grade cannabis containing less than 0.3% THC legalized in 2025. Recreational use is illegal and is punishable by 1 year of probation while repetition is punishable by 2 years of probation and enforced treatment. Sale and supply is punishable by a prison term of 5–10 years, and production or trafficking by a minimum term of 10 years.
